page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: My house is a four apartment.It contains a living room,kitchen, 3 bedrooms.There are 5 persons in the family, my mother,my father,one brother and one sister, and myself. I share a bedroom with my brother. On a typical day we get up at about 7_30am. My mum and dad go to work, my younger brother goes to secondary school with me and my younger sister goes to primary school. We normally get home before our parents who usually arrive at 5.30 pm.Normally we have our tea together and then usually watch television . At weekends the pattern is usually different as it is a time for some leisure and recreation.The whole family usually get together for birthdays,Christmas and New Year. My {home-life}is really quite varied.
